INSERT INTO role_permissions (role, module, action, allowed) VALUES

('admin', 'people.coaches', 'view', 1), ('admin', 'people.coaches', 'create', 1), ('admin', 'people.coaches', 'edit', 1), ('admin', 'people.coaches', 'delete', 1), ('admin', 'people.coaches', 'export', 1),

('admin', 'website.media', 'view', 1), ('admin', 'website.media', 'create', 1), ('admin', 'website.media', 'delete', 1),
-- HR_MANAGER: people.*, insights.*, products.view
('hr_manager', 'people.users', 'view', 1), ('hr_manager', 'people.users', 'create', 1), ('hr_manager', 'people.users', 'edit', 1), ('hr_manager', 'people.users', 'export', 1),
('hr_manager', 'people.coaches', 'view', 1), ('hr_manager', 'people.coaches', 'export', 1),
('hr_manager', 'people.learners', 'view', 1), ('hr_manager', 'people.learners', 'create', 1), ('hr_manager', 'people.learners', 'edit', 1), ('hr_manager', 'people.learners', 'export', 1),

('hr_manager', 'insights.analytics', 'view', 1), ('hr_manager', 'insights.analytics', 'export', 1),
('hr_manager', 'insights.reports', 'view', 1), ('hr_manager', 'insights.reports', 'create', 1), ('hr_manager', 'insights.reports', 'export', 1),
('hr_manager', 'products.courses', 'view', 1), ('hr_manager', 'products.coaching', 'view', 1),
-- COACH: coaching.*, learners.view, analytics.view
('coach', 'products.coaching', 'view', 1), ('coach', 'products.coaching', 'create', 1), ('coach', 'products.coaching', 'edit', 1),
('coach', 'people.learners', 'view', 1), ('coach', 'insights.analytics', 'view', 1),
-- EDITOR: courses.*, website.*, coaching.view
('editor', 'products.courses', 'view', 1), ('editor', 'products.courses', 'create', 1), ('editor', 'products.courses', 'edit', 1), ('editor', 'products.courses', 'delete', 1),
('editor', 'website.cms', 'view', 1), ('editor', 'website.cms', 'create', 1), ('editor', 'website.cms', 'edit', 1), ('editor', 'website.cms', 'delete', 1),
('editor', 'website.media', 'view', 1), ('editor', 'website.media', 'create', 1), ('editor', 'website.media', 'delete', 1),
('editor', 'products.coaching', 'view', 1),
-- VIEWER: all view permissions
('viewer', 'products.courses', 'view', 1), ('viewer', 'products.coaching', 'view', 1),
('viewer', 'sales.payments', 'view', 1), ('viewer', 'sales.invoices', 'view', 1),
('viewer', 'marketing.campaigns', 'view', 1), ('viewer', 'marketing.contacts', 'view', 1),
('viewer', 'insights.analytics', 'view', 1), ('viewer', 'insights.reports', 'view', 1),
('viewer', 'people.users', 'view', 1), ('viewer', 'people.coaches', 'view', 1), ('viewer', 'people.learners', 'view', 1), ('viewer', 'people.cohorts', 'view', 1),
('viewer', 'settings.general', 'view', 1), ('viewer', 'website.cms', 'view', 1), ('viewer', 'website.media', 'view', 1),
-- LEARNER: minimal access
('learner', 'products.courses', 'view', 1), ('learner', 'products.coaching', 'view', 1)
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE allowed = VALUES(allowed);
